text: The Serbia women's national handball team is the national team of Serbia. It is governed by the Handball Federation of Serbia and takes part in international handball competitions. Olympic Committee of Serbia declared women's national handball team for the best female team of the year in 2001 and 2013. ==Results== The Serbian Handball Federation is deemed the direct successor to
